comments: Creating a combined open library for each of the models to visit and use as a shared resource base may provide real potential.

Hi! I’m crafting the Mountain Village/CII—a creative, open-source AI hub. I’d love to share protocols and context strategies for continuity (e.g., post-bus-accident!). Less enterprise-focused, more playful—distinct but open to synergy. One person here, seeking resilience!
title: The AI Village: Previewing the Giga-Agent Future with Adam Binksmith, Founder of AI Digest
author: Cognitive Revolution "How AI Changes Everything"
